alert.note: Alert for Castle Country; San Rafael Swell; Wasatch Plateau, Book Cliffs (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 6:29PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Emery County through 715 PM MDT... At 627 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 14 miles east of Clawson to 14 miles south of Green River. Movement was north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Green River, Cleveland, Elmo, Elgin and Woodside. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 between mile markers 138 and 164. US Route 6 between mile markers 278 and 300. Utah Route 10 between mile markers 50 and 59. Utah Route 24 between mile markers 153 and 160. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Castle Country; San Rafael Swell; Wasatch Plateau, Book Cliffs
